name: Kolo Classic
description:
This game was made back in 2015 and for me, personally, it's a classic.
I don't remember why I called it "Kolo" but, yeah, that's probably a nice name XD

Basically your playing as a circle in a labyrinth (cringe btw)

There are 3 levels, and you can actually speedrun the game in (probably) 10-15 seconds. So don't espect much out of this game.
Enjoy!
